column2: As customer, I want to make reservation of flight ticket by using system so that I can save my time.
column14:
-Drop down list to select departure
-Drop down list to select date of flight
-Drop down list to select arrival
-Drop down list to select time of flight
-Drop down list to select number of seats
-Show which seats are available
-Show total price in label
-Reset button
-Reserve button
-After reserve button press, system will check for flight details, and pop out a message box "Are you sure you want to reserve this seats?" After pressing "Yes" button, system will prompt a Reservation ID to member and asked you to proceed to the counter for payment. Then, it will automatic redirect to payment page.

column2: As an admin users, I would like to add the flight schedule so that customers have more time to select
column14: This module allow users to add flights' schedule manually. It provide users to enter details for the flights' schedules such as schedule code, flights date, departure time, destination arrival time, flight code to determine which flights and the location code to where is the flight going to.

column29: All users to enter the location code to know where the is the flights going to.

column2: As an admin, i would like to login to the system so that I can add flight details
column14: The admin users would gain access to the system by providing specific ID and Password. The ID given to the admin users was predefined by the system which each ID has a format of Sxxxxxx where the x represents numbers and password is set by the uses themselves.
column19: Provide a login page for the admin users.
column21: Verify admin users' ID where its predefined with the format of Sxxxxxx
column23: Verify password set by admin users

column2: As a customer, I want to view my reservation details so that I can check my flight details.
column14:
-Drop down list to select flight reservation code
-Automatic display destination, departure, date, departure time, arrival time, seats reserved and total price.

column2: As a customer, I want to make payment of my flight ticket by using the system so that I can save time
column14:
-Require reservation ID
-Auto display total amount after verify reservation ID
-2 types of payment 
-Radio button credit card
-Radio button cash
-Cancel Reservation button
-After select type of payment, will let user choose payment method by using drop down list.
-After select payment method, customer require to enter card number, expiration date and security code.
-A "?" link to allow user to know what is a security code.
-Reset button to clear all the fields enter
-Submit to make payment 
-After press submit button, will ask user "Are you sure you want to pay?" and user choose "Yes" and pop out "Payment Successful"

column2: As a customer, I want to recover back my password so that I can login into the system.
column14:
-Require member ID
-Show security question
-Require security answer
-Submit button to get back password
-Clear button to clear all the fields
-Forget ID or Security Answer
-After the user input the correct secret answer, the system will display a message box to inform user his password.
